name: ConceptDraw MINDMAP Template
summary: A CDMTZ file is a mind-map template created by ConcepDraw MINDMAP, an application used to visualize ideas (known as mind maps). It is similar to .CDMZ mind map documents, as they store a diagram comprised of text, connecting relationship lines, images, and shapes, but users create them to replicate documents with similar content and appearance.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: CDMTZ file open in CS Odessa ConceptDraw MINDMAP 14
